reviewText: Always enjoyed these and wanted to have copies for whenever we wanted to watch them.  Great item to own and would recommend highly.
This is the 3rd copy of Young Frankenstien I have owned.  I keep loaning the copy out and never get it back.  This is classic Mel Brooks.

Young Frankenstein is a great movie, I think it is in the top 5 of Mel Brooks movies. Spaceballs is my second favorite of any Mel Brooks movie. It makes fun of a few different movies and you will laugh the whole way through.
Two classics for a great deal! I'm happy. We had to complete our star wars collection.
Space balls is an awesome movie but my friend enjoys young Frankenstein.... This is a good combo; it's a must buy...
Great movies, and the disks worked fine. One of the hinges that hold the disks was broken, but the disks were unscratched. Otherwise, good stuff.

OMG!!!!  What else can be said about "Young Frankenstein"????  A true classic!!!!  Just brilliant...still!!!!!

Spaceballs is okay...
I've been replacing movies that my husband took custody of in our divorce .These were 2 of my favorite "fun" movies.
This is one of those movies where the horror gender turns out to be a comedy gender. If you want to laugh, I recommend this movie.
Everything was great, on time, had no problems, and nothing was damaged. I'll continue to do a lot of shopping here.
